{"tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/copy-code": { "created": "20210528014602259", "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n\t$param=\"wrap-selection\"\n\tprefix='<$macrocall $name=\"copy-code\"\n\t\ttitle=\"\"\n\t\tlanguage=\"\"\n\t\tdisplay-language=\"show\"\n\t\tcode=\"\"\"'\n\tsuffix='\"\"\"/>'\n/>", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/copy-code", "caption": "shortcut copy code button with full macrocall syntax", "condition": "[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]", "creator": "user", "description": "Transform the selection into a code bloc with a copy to clipboard button - allow double angle brackets", "icon": "$:/core/images/copy-clipboard", "modified": "20230426183401862", "modifier": "user", "shortcuts": "alt-shift-m", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar $:/showInfo/macro/copy-code", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "revision": "0", "bag": "default", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/icon": { "created": "20230427014716602", "text": "{{$:/core/images/storyview-zoomin}}", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/icon", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20230427014724561" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/indent": { "created": "20230426123320189", "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n $message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n $param=\"save-selection\"\n tiddler=<>\n/>\n\n<$let tab={{{ [charcode[9]] }}} line={{{ [charcode[10]] }}}>\n<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n\t$param=\"replace-selection\"\n\ttext={{{ [get[text]splitaddprefixjoin] }}}\n/>\n", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/indent", "modified": "20230426183222628", "shortcuts": "tab", "icon": "$:/core/images/chevron-right", "description": "Indent with a tab", "condition": "[]", "caption": "indent", "type": "", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Shortcuts/plugin.info": { "created": "20230427225901362", "title":
